1353480.name: WGT Golf - Par Bundle
1353480.description:
This is a great place to start for new players, but all levels will benefit from this heavily discounted value pack!

The Par Bundle features:

  • 6x Bridgestone Ultra Slow Meter Vapor Balls (L0+) – Player-favorite golf balls that slow down the swing meter to help you hit more accurately and consistently
  • 500 WGT Credits – Visit the Pro Shop to find new club upgrades to pair with your slow meter balls, or new apparel items to find the perfect look for your golfer
  • 20,000 Coins – Test your skills in multiplayer games or rent special clubs in the Pro Shop
  • Immediately unlock all courses – Experience every WGT course available, right now

Items are delivered directly to your in-game inbox for you to collect and start using.

If purchased separately, the full price of these items would total $14.



*Offer available for purchase on Steam only. Locked courses are shown in the full course list with a lock icon and depending on your level, you may have already unlocked some or all of them. Some courses are not available in full stroke play or included in all game modes.
1353480.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
